reviewText: This has a lot of interesting information.  Looking forward to verifying this information while on travel there this summer.  Delivered as ordered.

This video had an issue running, once started did cover tourism info in Ecuador.  This video ran quickly over several tourist sights on the pan-american hwy then slowed and did a nice job on Galapagos Islands,  wish there had been more to this video.

This film was extremely disappointing.  Not a good value.  Primarily focuses on Galapagos, with a short bit on Quito and the native weavers.  I expected more on the entire country..... the landscape, the cities and rural area, the beach communities, as well as the people and their day to day living.
